chunk:
Anne's Apothecary Purity Cleansing Oil

Brand: Anne's Apothecary

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil ( Fractionated), Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Tanacetum annum (Tansy) Essential Oil, Olibanum ( Frankincense), Pelargonium x asperum (Geranium), Vitamin E (Tocopherol)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
